#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    string a,b;
	    cin>>a>>b;
	    map<char,int>count1;
	    map<char,int>count2;
	    for(int i=0;i<a.length();i++) count1[a[i]]++;
	    for(int i=0;i<b.length();i++) count2[b[i]]++;
	    bool flag=true;
	    for(char i='a';i<='z';i++){
	        if(count1!=count2){
	            flag=false;
	            break;
	        }
	    }
	    if(flag) cout<<"YES\n";
	    else cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
